text: Madhuca cuprea is a species of plant in the family Sapotaceae. It is a tree endemic to Peninsular Malaysia. The species is confined to rainforest in Perak. There is not enough information to determine whether it is endangered. ==References== cuprea Category:Endemic flora of Peninsular Malaysia Category:Trees of Peninsular Malaysia Category:Data deficient plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Madhuca cuprea
